items.question: What does Menuvo cost?
items.answer: No monthly fees. You only pay 2.9% per order. Plus normal payment fees (approx. 1.8% + €0.25 for card payments). For a €50 order, that's about €2.60 total – you keep €47.40.

items.question: Do I need a new POS system?
items.answer: No. Menuvo works standalone – you just need a smartphone or tablet to receive orders. It also works alongside your existing POS system.

items.question: How fast can I go live?
items.answer: In 5 minutes. Upload a photo of your menu, our AI creates the digital menu, and you can start receiving orders immediately.

items.question: Do I need hardware?
items.answer: No. No card reader, no terminal. Customers pay with their smartphone (card, Apple Pay, Google Pay). You see orders on your existing device.

items.question: Who is Menuvo for?
items.answer: Restaurants, cafés, food trucks, takeaways, pop-ups – anyone who wants to offer QR ordering without buying an expensive POS system or paying high commissions.

items.question: How does payment work?
items.answer: Customers pay directly when ordering with card, Apple Pay, Google Pay or PayPal. The money goes to your account. We use Mollie for payment processing.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, anytime. No minimum contract, no notice period. If you have no orders, you pay nothing.

items.question: Is Menuvo GDPR compliant?
items.answer: Yes. All data is hosted in Germany. Your customer data belongs exclusively to you.

items.question: What happens with my customer data?
items.answer: It belongs to you – not us, not a platform. You can use it for marketing, nurture regulars and build your own customer relationships.

footer.tagline: QR ordering without a new POS system. €0 monthly, 2.9% per order.
